name: Air Brigade 2 Early Test Flight Demo
name_original: Air Brigade 2 Early Test Flight Demo
description:
This game is designed for the Oculus Quest only! You will also need to sideload the game in order to play it. I recommend using SideQuest

This is a simple test flight where you are able to take an F-35 over an endless badlands terrain. The flight model used is the Silantro Flight Simulator toolkit. I am putting this out there now for those that would just like the opportunity to fly around a virtual world on their quest.

Please feel no inclination to donate, though if you do trust me to finish this project and would like to support it, just a few bucks here or there is very appreciated!
